extension.name: Media Library
extension.description: Media management extension for Symphony CMS. Edit images and manage upload file.

releases.release: - Better 'Upload' UI with split screen drag/drop
- Only show select all of there is more than one file
- Better 'Select All' UI, with ability to toggle all at once
- Add ability to create directories
- BREAKING CHANGE: Restructure the output into nodes instead of attributes. This was getting too large and unreadable, and nodes are easier to deal with within xslt
- Re-work the subdirectories into a breadcrumb for easier visualisation and navigation
- Add apache check for mod_expires module
- Bug fix: JSON files are cached making it look like the Alts and Tags aren't being added. I have added an htaccess file to the JSON directory that overrides the cache and forces it to revalidate
- Bug fix: file name was getting lost after the restructure of content.
- Bug fix: Position of tag/alt inputs was behind submit button
- Bug fix: Filtering has been broken since the structure changes of 2.1.5.
- Bug fix: 'View' links on Media Library Fields were going to incorrect file URL after file had been replaced
- Bug fix: row options were collapsing to a new line when tags or alt attributes were added. Add better flex rules.
- Add resize utility to Doka - Stop rename prompt happening when Doka is escaped
- Add ability to edit and replace/rename an existing file (must have Doka files loaded in) - Restructure file rows for better alignment/spacing
- Bug fix: incorrect file path for JSON files in XML output
- Better folder layout and naming
- Add Alt attributes to images - Output Alt attributes and tags into page XML

- Bug fix: remove event handlers on back/forwards directory click events on re-init of main function to prevent stacking of click events - Bug fix: better fasly declaration on undefined/null folder path
- Bug fix: prevent events being called multiple times
- Consistent styling for fields within the Primary column - Add a landscape and portrait ratio with relevant validation
- Remove icon from navigation - Add scripts/styles from local source instead of calling them from unpkg.com as it's often slow to load
- Allow multiple files to be selected at once when field allows it
- Add a check for animated GIFs into FilePond transform process, if it is then don't apply transform which converts it to a PNG.

- Media Fields within Modal boxes weren't opening because of the `trigger` call on a non existant nav item. I have fixed this by wrapping the loading of the ML into a function and calling that on click instead.
- Add ability to define a destinition folder for file selection

- Create field specific validation for image ratio and file size - Bug fix: validation didn't loop through data array and only validated first item. It now validates all files attached. - Add better Doka crop ratios - Redo the read me
- Bug fix: delete button event wasn't triggering on AJAX loaded content - Bug fix: rogue colon in delete file function causing an error
- Better define jQuery
- Add missing `Symphony::Configuration()->remove()` from Uninstall function - Add File Size validation - Add Image Size validation
- Add a file_exists check for the Doka files to prevent unecessary requests which fail
- Type fix where min image height was being applied to max image height

- Replace upload method with FilePond - Include Doka integration, if user has a licence - Add preferences pane for image editing options - Some styling changes for better flow - Automatically refresh list of files on completion of upload
- Sanitize the file name when uploading to prevent special characters causing display issues with images
- Sanitize the file name to prevent errors in XML output, specifically the name attribute
- Update how multiple items are displayed - Add drag/drop for reording multiple items
- Add ability for multiple files to be attached - Add default preview so something is always displayed
- Bug fix where ML wouldn't trigger within AJAX loaded content (e.g within Entry Relationship Field content)
- Add validation to Media Library field - Add a remove link to unattach files - Show video and audio previews - Have bigger previews in the Primary column

- Add a Media Library Field to the section editor - The new field triggers the ML which allows for uploading/selecting a file to attach to an entry - Show a preview of the file if it's an image - Output the field in a datasource with relevant meta data
- Add a tag count to the Tags link, and add hover state showing tag content - Ignore changes to the json file
- Tagging bug fixes
- Tagging bug fixes
- Added ability to tag images, which are searchable
- Update so deleting works within lightbox - Bug fixes
- Remove unused plugins and add clipboard into extension js file for fewer requests - Add AJAX call for page fetching - Combine this plugin with TinyMCE plugin to work within editors
- Removed Featherlite, and open previews in a new tab instead
- Order files by date instead of name - Hide directories by default. A button has been added for toggling their visibility - Added an input for filtering files based on a keyword match
- Restructured the way files are displayed - Added loads of features
